title: The 5 Essential Steps To Starting A Successful Business
summary: Most new businesses fail because they don’t know how to market their products. The majority of businesses spend 80% of their time creating products and only 20% promoting them. A marketing plan is a written document that outlines your company’s goals, objectives, and strategies for reaching those goals. Having a marketing plan in place before starting your business will save you time, money, and headaches down the road. Research the competition before starting a business will help you understand the challenges you’ll face as an entrepreneur.

Often it\u2019s because the owners didn\u2019t understand the market they were entering or underestimated how much time and money it would take to get their company off the ground.
